name: AcidFlask
description:
You can throw a flask of acid as a splash weapon with a range increment of 10 feet.
A direct hit deals 1d6 points of acid damage. Every creature within 5 feet of the point where the acid hits takes 1 point of acid damage from the splash.

name: AlchemistsFire
description:
You can throw a flask of alchemist's fire as a splash weapon with a range of 30 feet.
A direct hit deals 1d6 points of fire damage. Every creature within 5 feet of the point where the flask hits takes 1 point of fire damage from the splash. On the round following a direct hit, the target takes an additional 1d6 points of damage.

name: AmberLoveRodItem
display_name: Metamagic Rod of the Attractive Impulse
description: This rod grants you the ability to modify up to six spells per day so that the in addition to their main effect they affect the target with a dominate person spell.

name: AmberLustRodItem
display_name: Metamagic Rod of the Attractive Impulse
description:
This rod grants you the ability to modify up to six spells per day so that the energy type of the damage they deal changes to unholy. The modified spell also becomes maximized as though using the Maximize Spell feat.
Greater rods can be used with spells of 9th level or lower.
Maximize Spell

name: Artifact_HolySymbolOfIomedaeItem
description: This symbol of Iomedae, when placed on the belt, emits a holy aura. All party members in 30-feet area get a +2 bonus to caster level checks made to overcome spell resistance. Their weapons become Good-aligned and count as if they were made of cold iron.

name: BaneAnimalQuiverItem
description: The owner of this quiver can use it to shoot 20 units of flaming ammunition per day. Flaming ammunition deals additional 1d6 fire damage on hit.

name: BaneMonstrousHumanoidArrowsQuiverItem
description: The owner of this quiver can use it to shoot 20 units of monstrous humanoid bane ammunition. A bane ammunition excels against certain foes. Against a designated foe, the weapon's enhancement bonus is +2 better than its actual bonus. It also deals an extra 2d6 points of damage against such foes.

name: BaneOutsiderChaoticArrowsQuiverItem
description: The owner of this quiver can use it to shoot 20 units of flaming ammunition per day. Flaming ammunition deals additional 1d6 fire damage on hit.

name: BaneOutsiderEvilArrowsQuiverItem
description: The owner of this quiver can use it to shoot 20 units of flaming ammunition per day. Flaming ammunition deals additional 1d6 fire damage on hit.

name: BaneUndeadArrowsQuiverItem
description: The owner of this quiver can use it to shoot 20 units of flaming ammunition per day. Flaming ammunition deals additional 1d6 fire damage on hit.

name: BlindingBombItem
description:
You can throw a flask as a splash weapon with a range of 30 feet.
Every creature within 5 feet of the point where the flask hits must pass Fortitude saving throw (DC 24) or be Blinded for 1d3 rounds.

name: BrazenWhipItem
description: While this item is active, all creatures summoned by the wearer get one extra attack per round. However the wearer is under the slow spell effect.

name: Briar
description: You can strike your enemy with this item as a melee touch attack. This will affect the target in an unpredictable way.

name: Cat_Item
description:
Summons a pet cat.
Cat's Feral Instincts provide +2 morale bonus on Perception and Lore (Nature) checks.

name: ChannelersRod
description: This rod grants its wielder the ability to make up to three kinetic blasts they cast per day quickened as though using the Quicken Spell feat.

name: CharoiteWyvernItem
description: This figurine is capable of summoning a ancient wyvern once per day for 10 minutes. The ancient wyvern's bite and talons are just as deadly as its sting, and it is capable of breathing poison on its enemies. The wyvern draws power from the owner of the figurine, and its HD is equal to the summoner's character level, with a maximum of 20 HD.

name: CoinOfProtectionItem
description: This coin grants its wearer the ability to grant any ally DR 5/- for 1 minute, once per day.

name: ColdIronArrowsQuiverItem
description: The owner of this quiver can use it to shoot 50 units of cold iron ammunition. Cold iron ammunition is known for the effectiveness against demons and fey creatures. It is forged at a lower temperature to preserve its delicate properties.

name: ColdIronArrowsQuiverItem_20Charges
description: The owner of this quiver can use it to shoot 20 units of cold iron ammunition. Cold iron ammunition is known for its effectiveness against demons and fey creatures. It is forged at a lower temperature to preserve its delicate properties.

name: ConcentratedAcidFlask
description:
You can throw a flask of acid as a splash weapon with a range increment of 10 feet.
A direct hit deals 10d6 points of acid damage. Every creature within 5 feet of the point where the acid hits takes 10 point of acid damage from the splash.

name: ConfusionBombItem
description: This unique bomb was created by Alichino. All enemies in 15 feet area must pass Will saving throw (DC 35) or become confused for 1d4 +1 rounds.

name: CorrosionBombItem
description:
You can throw a flask as a splash weapon with a range of 30 feet.
Every creature within 10 feet of the point where the flask hits must pass Fortitude saving throw (DC 24) or suffer 6d6 acid damage. In addition, the flask leaves an acid trail in the area of impact, making everyone who passes through it suffer 6d6 acid damage on a failed Fortitude saving throw (DC 24).

name: CrimsonBannerItem
description: While this Item is active, all critical hits made by you or against you are automatically confirmed.

name: CursedThornArrowsQuiverItem
description: The owner of this quiver can use it to shoot 20 units of cursed ammunition. Whenever this ammunition hits an enemy, it must pass a Reflex saving throws (DC 17) or will be entangled by unholy vine for 1d4 rounds. Each round enemy tries to break from this entanglement, if this try was unsuccessful, the vines deals 1d10 unholy damage.

name: DarkVeilItem
description: Once per day you may use this item to grant your party total concealment against ranged attacks for 1 minute.

name: DemonsEyeItem
description: This eye of a demon still holds some power. Three times per day you can curse the enemy. The cursed target suffers a -8 penalty to Strength and Constitution.

name: DisplacementBombItem
description: This unique bomb was created by Alichino. All allies in 30 feet area receive the effect of the displacement spell for 5 rounds.

name: DriedHandOfmartyrItem
description: This dried hand grants the owner an ability to cast the death ward spell once per day as a 9th level Cleric.

name: ElixirMasterpiece
description: Whoever drinks this elixir will permanently gain a +2 inherent bonus to all ability scores.

name: ElvenProtectorQuiverItem
description: This quiver provides a limitless supply of lawful, cold iron ammunition that gives a +2 bonus to both attack and damage against fey.

name: FaerieDragon_01_Item
description:
Summons a tiny pet dragon.
Dragon's Useful Advice provides +2 morale bonus on Knowledge (World), Knowledge (Arcana) and Lore (Religion) checks.

name: FatalMarkQuiverItem
description: The owner of this quiver can use it to shoot 30 units of ammunition every day. On hit, this ammunition marks its targets and creates an invisible bond among them. Whenever the wielder hits a marked enemy, all other marked enemies suffer 2d6 damage.

name: FlamingArrowsQuiverItem
description: The owner of this quiver can use it to shoot 20 units of flaming ammunition per day. Flaming ammunition deals additional 1d6 fire damage on hit.

name: FlayleafItem
description: For 1 hour, the user gains a +2 alchemical bonus on saving throws against mind-affecting effects and fatigue. However, the user also suffers 1 point of Wisdom ability damage.

name: ForcefulPushArrowsQuiverItem
description: The owner of this quiver can use it to shoot 30 units of enchanted ammunition. This ammunition deals additional 1d8 bludgeoning damage. Each time the projectile hits an enemy, the enemy must pass a Fortitude saving throw (DC 15+ wielder's STR modifier) or it will be pushed back on 5 feet and become prone.

name: GrandOwlOfWisdomItem
description: This figurine of a cat is engraved with a name that doesn't fit its appearance. Once activated, it grants the user a permanent +1 bonus on all skill checks, and then vanishes.

name: HandOfMagusDanItem
description: Whenever the wearer uses a scroll, either to scribe it into a spellbook or to cast a spell, the hand has a 25% chance to produce a perfect copy of the expended scroll.

name: HolyArrowsQuiverItem
description: The owner of this quiver can use it to shoot 10 units of holy ammunition. A holy ammunition is imbued with holy power. This power makes the weapon good-aligned and thus bypasses the corresponding damage reduction. It deals an extra 2d6 points of damage against all creatures of evil alignment.

name: HolyWater
description:
You can throw a flask of Holy Water as a splash weapon with a range increment of 10 feet.
A direct hit deals 2d4 points of holy damage to an undead creature or an evil outsider. Each such creature within 5 feet of the point where the flask hits takes 1 point of holy damage from the splash.

name: InvisibilityBombItem
description: This unique bomb was created by Alichino. All allies in 30 feet area receive the effect of the greater invisibility spell for 5 rounds.

name: JokeOfNatureArrowsQuiverItem
description: The owner of this quiver can use it to shoot 20 units of ammunition. This ammunition deals additional 1d6+5 piercing damage and on a confirmed critical hit transforms the enemy into a pony for 1 round.

name: LapisLazuliWyvernItem
description: This figurine is capable of summoning a barbtongued wyvern once per day for 10 minutes. The barbtongued wyvern's bite is just as deadly as its sting. The wyvern draws power from the owner of the figurine, and its HD is equal to the summoner's character level, with a maximum of 16 HD.

name: LesserSonicArrowsQuiverItem
description: The owner of this quiver can use it to shoot 20 units of ammunition. This ammunition deals additional 2 sonic damage.

name: LightningArrowsQuiverItem
description: The owner of this quiver can use it to shoot 20 units of shock speed ammunition per day. Shock ammunition deals additional 1d6 electric damage on hit. Using this quiver increases chances of critical hit as well as critical damage.

name: LoversArrowsQuiverItem
description: The owner of this quiver can use it to shoot 20 units of frost speed ammunition per day. Frost ammunition deals additional 2d6 cold damage on hit. Using this quiver grants chances to dominate the target for 1d6 rounds.

name: LuckyDicesItem
description: These dice randomly grant the owner a +1 luck bonus on an attack or damage roll, or to AC during an enemy's attack, once per day. This effect lasts for the whole day.

name: ManualOfBodilyHealthPlus2
description: This thick tome contains tips on health and fitness, but entwined within the words is a powerful magical effect. If anyone reads this book, she permanently gains a +2 inherent bonus to her Constitution score. Once the book is read, the magic disappears from the pages and it becomes a normal book.

name: ManualOfGainfulExercisePlus2
description: This thick tome contains exercise descriptions and diet suggestions, but entwined within the words is a powerful magical effect. If anyone reads this book, she permanently gains a +2 inherent bonus to her Strength score. Once the book is read, the magic disappears from the pages and it becomes a normal book.

name: ManualOfQuicknessOfActionPlus2
description: This thick tome contains tips on coordination exercises and balance, but entwined within the words is a powerful magical effect. If anyone reads this book, she permanently gains a +2 inherent bonus to her Dexterity score. Once the book is read, the magic disappears from the pages and it becomes a normal book.

name: MarksmansAidArrowsQuiverItem
description: The owner of this quiver can use it to shoot 40 units of ammunition. Though this ammunition does not deal any damage, it marks the target on a hit, thus all other companions get additional 2 bonus on each attack against this enemy. This effect doesn't affect the initiator even if she equips other quivers or weapons. Only one creature can be marked per encounter.

name: MetamagicRodGreaterEmpower
description:
This rod grants its wielder the ability to make up to three spells they cast per day empowered, as though using the Empower Spell feat.
Greater rods can be used with spells of 9th level or lower.
Empower Spell

name: MetamagicRodGreaterExtend
description:
This rod grants its wielder the ability to make up to three spells they cast per day extended as though using the Extend Spell feat.
Greater rods can be used with spells of 9th level or lower.
Extend Spell

name: MetamagicRodGreaterMaximize
description:
This rod grants its wielder the ability to make up to three spells they cast per day maximized as though using the Maximize Spell feat.
Greater rods can be used with spells of 9th level or lower.
Maximize Spell

name: MetamagicRodGreaterQuicken
description:
This rod grants its wielder the ability to make up to three spells they cast per day quickened as though using the Quicken Spell feat.
Greater rods can be used with spells of 9th level or lower.
Quicken Spell

name: MetamagicRodGreaterReach
description:
This rod grants its wielder the ability to make up to three spells they cast per day reach as though using the Reach Spell feat.
Greater rods can be used with spells of 9th level or lower.
Reach Spell

name: MetamagicRodLesserEmpower
description:
This rod grants its wielder the ability to make up to three spells they cast per day empowered, as though using the Empower Spell feat.
Lesser rods can be used with spells of 3rd level or lower.
Empower Spell

name: MetamagicRodLesserExtend
description:
This rod grants its wielder the ability to make up to three spells they cast per day extended as though using the Extend Spell feat.
Lesser rods can be used with spells of 3rd level or lower.
Extend Spell

name: MetamagicRodLesserKinetic
description: This rod increases the damage dealt by the kineticist's simple energy blasts by 1d6 points and by kineticist simple physical blasts by 1d6+1. Composite energy blasts instead deal an additional 2d6 damage, while composite physical blasts deal an additional 2d6+2 damage.

name: MetamagicRodLesserMaximize
description:
This rod grants its wielder the ability to make up to three spells they cast per day maximized as though using the Maximize Spell feat.
Lesser rods can be used with spells of 3rd level or lower.
Maximize Spell

name: MetamagicRodLesserQuicken
description:
This rod grants its wielder the ability to make up to three spells they cast per day quickened as though using the Quicken Spell feat.
Lesser rods can be used with spells of 3rd level or lower.
Quicken Spell

name: MetamagicRodLesserReach
description:
This rod grants its wielder the ability to make up to three spells they cast per day reach as though using the Reach Spell feat.
Lesser rods can be used with spells of 3rd level or lower.
Reach Spell

name: MetamagicRodMasterpiece
description: This rod grants its wielder the ability to make up to three spells they cast per day infused with the primal magical essence. Those spells are Maximized and Empowered as though using Maximize Spell and Empower Spell feats, and ignore spell resistance and magic immunity of the target.

name: MetamagicRodNormalEmpower
description:
This rod grants its wielder the ability to make up to three spells they cast per day empowered, as though using the Empower Spell feat.
Regular rods can be used with spells of 6th level or lower.
Empower Spell

name: MetamagicRodNormalExtend
description:
This rod grants its wielder the ability to make up to three spells they cast per day extended as though using the Extend Spell feat.
Regular rods can be used with spells of 6th level or lower.
Extend Spell

name: MetamagicRodNormalMaximize
description:
This rod grants its wielder the ability to make up to three spells they cast per day maximized as though using the Maximize Spell feat.
Regular rods can be used with spells of 6th level or lower.
Maximize Spell

name: MetamagicRodNormalQuicken
description:
This rod grants its wielder the ability to make up to three spells they cast per day quickened as though using the Quicken Spell feat.
Regular rods can be used with spells of 6th level or lower.
Quicken Spell

name: MetamagicRodNormalReach
description:
This rod grants its wielder the ability to make up to three spells they cast per day reach as though using the Reach Spell feat.
Regular rods can be used with spells of 6th level or lower.
Reach Spell

name: OculusItem
description: This artifact doubles the duration of all spells cast by its wearer as though using the Extend Spell feat. Three times per day its wearer can peer into it to cast true seeing spell as a 20th level wizard. Yet, staring into this gem is dangerous

name: OilAcid
description: Adds 1d6 acid damage to a weapon, making it corrosive.

name: OilBaneEverything
description: This very adaptive oil can copy the effect of Bane Everything.

name: OilOfExtremeForst
description: Adds 4d6 frost damage to a weapon.

name: OilofEnhancement
description: Gives +2 temporary enhancement to a chosen weapon.

name: OilofUnholiness
description: Adds 2d6 damage against all creatures of good alignmet to a weapon.

name: OldGrimoireItem
description: This old grimoire grants its owner 3 slots for 1 level spells, 2 slots for 2 level spells, and 2 slots for 3 level spells for the wearer's spellcasting class with the highest caster level.

name: Owlcat_Item
description:
Summons a pet owlcat.
Owlcat's Feral Instincts provide +2 morale bonus on Perception and Lore (Nature) checks.

name: ParalyzingBombItem
description: This unique bomb was created by Alichino. All enemies in 15 feet area must pass a Reflex saving throw (DC 35) or be paralyzed for 1d3 rounds.

name: PeridotWyvernItem
description: This figurine is capable of summoning a mighty wyvern once per day for 10 minutes. The wyvern draws power from the owner of the figurine, and its HD is equal to the summoner's character level, with a maximum of 12 HD.

name: PotionOfProtectionFromFire
description: This potion can protect you from fire by absorbing first 36 fire damage.

name: PreciousTreatItem
description: While this item is active, the owner's animal companion (if they have one) gets a +2 insight bonus on attack and damage rolls, as well as saving throws. However the wielder suffers -3 penalty to attack.

name: QuestElectriItem
description:
Owner of this book reads one new chapter every time on rest, granting a benefit until the next rest depending on which companion the chapter described, chapter selected randomly.
The chapter about Shelburn grants an ability to use Fireball 3 times (caster level 10, DC 18) this day. The chapter about Lord Jessiahdor grants a +5 competence bonus to Persuasion and Use Magic Device checks. The chapter about Skerple allows the owner to deal 1 additional damage on each sneak attack damage die. The chapter about Wolfgang Hypeton grants +10 competence bonus to Stealth checks. The chapter about Ristof Brulston grants an ability to make the target Rage, as a barbarian, for 6 rounds 3 times this day. The chapter about Kenneth Cowannan grants an ability to use Lightning Bolt 3 times (caster level 10, DC 18) this day.

name: RainOfArrowsQuiverItem
description: The owner of this quiver can use it to shoot 40 units of ammunition. Though this ammunition does not deal any damage, it marks the target on a hit, thus all other companions get additional 2 bonus on each attack against this enemy. This effect doesn't affect the initiator even if she equips other quivers or weapons. Only one creature can be marked per encounter.

name: RedPanda_Item
description:
Summons a pet red panda.
Red Panda's Emotional Support provides +1 morale bonus to saving throws.

name: RodOfFiredVengenceItem
description:
This rod is hot to touch. It vibrates slightly with the power burning inside. It transforms all wielder's spell damage into fire damage, increasing caster level by 1 and +3 bonus to Evocation school spells' DC. It also grants its wielder the ability to make up to five spells they cast per day maximized as though using the Maximize Spell feat.
Greater rods can be used with spells of 9th level or lower.
Maximize Spell

name: RodOfMysticismItem
description:
This rod grants the wielder the ability to cast up to three spells from Oracle/Cleric spell list per day that are maximized as though using the Maximize Spell feat.
This rod can be used with spells of 6th level or lower. Only an Oracle or Cleric can wield it.
Maximize Spell

name: RodOfPowerItem
description:
This heavy, softly humming rod grants the wielder a +4 bonus to Conjuration school spells' DC and the ability to make up to five spells they cast per day empowered, as though using the Empower Spell feat.
Regular rods can be used with spells of 6th level or lower.
Empower Spell

name: RodOfUndeadItem
description:
This rod grants its wielder a +2 bonus to Necromancy school spells' DC and grants the ability to make up to four spells they cast per day extended as though using the Extend Spell feat.
Regular rods can be used with spells of 6th level or lower.
Extend Spell

name: RodofFearless
description:
This rod grants the wielder a +3 bonus to saving throws against fear. It also grants its wielder the ability to make up to three spells they cast per day quickened as though using the Quicken Spell feat.
Lesser rods can be used with spells of 3rd level or lower.
Quicken Spell

name: SacredVengenanceArrowsQuiverItem
description: The owner of this quiver can use it to shoot 30 units of ammunition. This ammunition hits first enemy as well as two additional enemies, each of which must be within 15 feet of the primary target. It deals additional 1d6 points of holy damage.

name: SecretIngredientItem
description:
Once per day you may use this ability to make all potions used by your party empowered and maximized, as though using the Empower Spell and Maximize Spell feats, for 1 minute.
Empower Spell

name: SeersCardsItem
description: These cards can be activated to predict the future. While they are activated, you get a +1 insight bonus to attack and damage rolls, AC, all saving throws and skill checks.

name: SkeletalFingerRodQuickenNormalItem
description:
This rod grants its wielder the ability to make up to three spells they cast per day quickened as though using the Quicken Spell feat.
Regular rods can be used with spells of 6th level or lower.
Each time the wielder kills a living creature using boneshaker, vampiric touch, boneshatter or exsanguinate spell, the rod recovers one daily use. This effect can be activated up to three times per day.
Quicken Spell

name: StinkyBombItem
description:
You can throw a flask as a splash weapon with a range of 30 feet.
Every creature within 5 feet range of the point where the flask lands must pass a Fortitude saving throw (DC 46) or become unconscious due to the smell for 1d3 rounds. On a successful saving throw creature becomes sickened for 1 round.

name: StunBombItem
description:
You can throw a flask as a splash weapon with a range of 30 feet.
Every creature within 5 feet of the point where the flask hits must pass Fortitude saving throw (DC 24) or be stunned for 1d3 rounds.

name: TomeOfClearThoughtPlus2
description: This heavy book contains instruction on improving memory and logic, but entwined within the words is a powerful magical effect. If anyone reads this book, she permanently gains a +2 inherent bonus to her Intelligence score. Once the book is read, the magic disappears from the pages and it becomes a normal book.

name: TomeOfLeadershipAndInfluencePlus2
description: This ponderous book details suggestions for persuading and inspiring others, but entwined within the words is a powerful magical effect. If anyone reads this book, she permanently gains a +2 inherent bonus to her Charisma score. Once the book is read, the magic disappears from the pages and it becomes a normal book.

name: TomeOfUnderstandingPlus2
description: This thick book contains tips for improving instinct and perception, but entwined within the words is a powerful magical effect. If anyone reads this book, she permanently gains a +2 inherent bonus to her Wisdom score. Once the book is read, the magic disappears from the pages and it becomes a normal book.

name: UltrasoundArrowsQuiverItem
description: The owner of this quiver can use it to shoot 20 units of sonic speed ammunition per day. Sonic ammunition deals additional 1d3 sonic damage on hit. The structure of the ammunition allows shooting twice as often.

name: WandOfOddMiracleItem
description: This wand of odd miracles has 3 charges that are restored on the rest. Whenever the wielder uses this wand on of the following spells is cast

name: WandOfSummonMonsterZero
description: This wand summons an extraplanar murder pony to your side once per day.

name: WeakenArrowsQuiverItem
description: The owner of this quiver can use it to shoot 20 units of unholy speed ammunition per day. This ammunition deals additional 2d8 unholy damage on hit. Using this quiver grants chances to weaken the target for 1d6 rounds as if it was under Curse of Weakness spell.
